Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in mezzio/mezzio-swoole.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.7.0, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.3.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.7.0 before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.3.0
